synopsis.text: Shizuka Kominami is a shy and reserved college student struggling to adjust to city life. At a college mixer, she meets the beautiful and confident Ryou Kirishima. The two hit it off and go out drinking together after the event. Ryou invites Shizuka back to her apartment where she attempts to seduce Shizuka. Shockingly, Shizuka discovers that Ryou is actually a crossdressing man hiding his identity from his many fans. Despite her surprise, Shizuka is not completely turned off by Ryou's advances. Ryou leaves Shizuka a suggestive note promising more intimate encounters in the future. This anime explores the complex relationship between the mild-mannered Shizuka and the predatory, crossdressing Ryou.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
